General.Name: Central Asia Metals plc
General.Description: Central Asia Metals plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a base metals producer. The company produces copper, zinc, silver, and lead. It owns a 100% interest in the Kounrad solvent extraction- electrowinning operation located near the city of Balkhash in central Kazakhstan; and a 100% interest in the Sasa mine located in north Macedonia. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Sackville House, London, United Kingdom, W1J 0DR

4.Name: Ms. Louise  Wrathall
4.Title: Exec. Director & Exec. Director of Corp. Devel.
